products.name: Vitamin D Milk
products.facts: ["Vitamin D milk is fortified with vitamin D2 or D3 to enhance bone health.","The packaging for vitamin D milk is often recyclable, reducing environmental impact.","Vitamin D milk typically comes from cows that are fed a diet free from antibiotics and hormones.","The quality of vitamin D milk is regulated by the USDA to ensure safety and nutritional value."]

products.facts: ["250g is often made from recycled paper materials, promoting sustainability.","The production of 250g materials typically uses eco-friendly inks and adhesives.","250g products are designed for durability, ensuring a long lifespan and reduced waste.","Many 250g items are biodegradable, minimizing their environmental impact after disposal."]

["200g is often made from recyclable materials, reducing environmental impact.","The production of 200g products typically involves sustainable practices to minimize ecological footprint.","Many 200g items are designed for reusability, promoting a circular economy.","Quality standards for 200g products often include certifications for safety and environmental responsibility."]

products.name: 100% Grated Parmesan Cheese
products.facts: ["Made from high-quality cow's milk, ensuring rich flavor and texture.","Typically contains no artificial preservatives, maintaining a natural product.","Sustainably sourced from farms that prioritize animal welfare and environmental stewardship.","Aged for a minimum of 10 months, enhancing its quality and taste profile."]

products.name: 100% Natural Spring  Water
products.categories: Beverages, Waters, Spring waters, Drinking water
products.facts: ["The bottle is made from recyclable PET plastic, promoting sustainability.","100% natural spring water is sourced from protected springs, ensuring purity and quality.","The water undergoes rigorous testing to meet safety and quality standards set by health authorities.","Natural spring water contains essential minerals that can contribute to hydration and health."]

products.name: Black beans in water
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Legumes and their products, Canned foods, Legumes, Seeds, Canned plant-based foods, Legume seeds, Pulses, Common beans, Canned legumes, Black beans, Canned black beans, Canned common beans, Black-beans-in-water
products.facts: ["Black beans are a rich source of protein and fiber, making them a nutritious addition to meals.","Canned black beans in water typically contain no preservatives, making them a convenient and healthy option.","Black beans can help improve soil health when used in crop rotation, as they fix nitrogen in the soil.","Quality black beans should have a firm texture and a deep black color, indicating freshness and proper storage."]

products.name: Hipro saveur coco
products.facts: ["Hipro saveur coco is made from natural coconut extract.","The product is packaged in eco-friendly materials to reduce environmental impact.","It contains no artificial flavors or preservatives, ensuring high quality.","Hipro saveur coco is sourced from sustainable coconut farms, promoting ecological balance."]

products.name: All Bran Flakes
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Cereals and potatoes, Cereals and their products, en:breakfast-cereals
products.facts: ["All Bran Flakes are primarily made from wheat bran, which is a byproduct of wheat milling.","The packaging of All Bran Flakes is recyclable, contributing to reduced waste.","All Bran Flakes are high in dietary fiber, promoting digestive health and regularity.","The product contains no artificial colors or flavors, ensuring a natural quality."]

products.name: Sriracha Hot Chili Sauce
products.facts: ["Sriracha Hot Chili Sauce is primarily made from chili peppers, vinegar, garlic, sugar, and salt.","The chili peppers used in Sriracha are often sourced from sustainable farms to promote ecological farming practices.","Sriracha is gluten-free and contains no artificial preservatives, ensuring a high-quality product.","The packaging is often made from recyclable materials, aligning with eco-friendly initiatives."]

products.name: Hershey's Syrup Chocolate
products.ingredients_text: HIGH FRUCTOSE CORN SYRUP; CORN SYRUP; WATER; COCOA; SUGAR; POTASSIUM SORBATE 2% (TO MAINTAIN FRESHNESS); XANTHAN GUM; SALT; MONO - AND DIGLYCERIDES; POLYSORBATE 60; VANILLIN; ARTIFICIAL FLAVOR.
products.labels: Bajo o sin grasas,Sin gluten,Kosher,Sin colorantes artificiales,Sin grasas,Unión Ortodoxa Kosher
products.facts: ["Hershey's Syrup is made from high-quality cocoa and sugar, ensuring a rich chocolate flavor.","The packaging is designed to be recyclable, promoting eco-friendly practices.","Hershey's Syrup contains no artificial preservatives, maintaining a focus on quality ingredients.","The product is gluten-free, catering to a wider range of dietary preferences."]
